title: The Wonders of Light
image_desc: A vibrant image showing a spectrum of colors, transitioning smoothly from red to violet, with a bright sun subtly visible in the background.
content: Light is a form of energy.
narration: Hello everyone!  Today, we're exploring the amazing world of light.  Light, as we all know, is what lets us see the world around us. But it's so much more than that!  It's a form of energy, traveling in waves, and responsible for so many incredible phenomena.  This image shows the beautiful spectrum of light, a reminder of its diverse and fascinating nature.
